pipeline: Simplified Bypass Pipeline with CAPE Validation

new_signature_details.name: queries_computer_name
new_signature_details.description: Queries computer hostname

new_signature_details.name: dynamic_function_loading
new_signature_details.description: Dynamic (imported) function loading detected

new_signature_details.name: queries_keyboard_layout
new_signature_details.description: Queries the keyboard layout

new_signature_details.name: queries_locale_api
new_signature_details.description: Queries the computer locale (possible geofencing)

new_signature_details.name: stealth_timeout
new_signature_details.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

new_signature_details.name: antisandbox_sleep
new_signature_details.description: A process attempted to delay the analysis task.

data.note: mnolyk.exe tried to sleep 1211.75 seconds, actually delayed analysis time by 0.0 seconds

new_signature_details.name: http_request
new_signature_details.description: Performs HTTP requests potentially not found in PCAP.

new_signature_details.name: resumethread_remote_process
new_signature_details.description: Resumed a thread in another process

data.thread_resumed: Process mnolyk.exe with process ID 1800 resumed a thread in another process with the process ID 920
Process cmd.exe with process ID 4416 resumed a thread in another process with the process ID 8152

new_signature_details.name: injection_write_process
new_signature_details.description: Writes to the memory another process

data.write_memory: Process mnolyk.exe with process ID 1800 wrote to the memory of process handle 0x00000538
Process cmd.exe with process ID 4416 wrote to the memory of process handle 0x000002d0

new_signature_details.name: createtoolhelp32snapshot_module_enumeration
new_signature_details.description: Enumerates the modules from a process (may be used to locate base addresses in process injection)

new_signature_details.name: reads_self
new_signature_details.description: Reads data out of its own binary image

new_signature_details.name: stealth_window
new_signature_details.description: A process created a hidden window

new_signature_details.name: uses_windows_utilities
new_signature_details.description: Uses Windows utilities for basic functionality

new_signature_details.name: uses_windows_utilities_to_create_scheduled_task
new_signature_details.description: Uses Windows utilities to create a scheduled task

new_signature_details.name: infostealer_cookies
new_signature_details.description: Touches a file containing cookies, possibly for information gathering

new_signature_details.name: persistence_autorun_tasks
new_signature_details.description: Installs itself for autorun at Windows startup

new_signature_details.name: recon_beacon
new_signature_details.description: A process sent information about the computer to a remote location.

new_signature_details.name: antiav_detectfile
new_signature_details.description: Attempts to identify installed AV products by installation directory

new_signature_details.name: cmdline_obfuscation
new_signature_details.description: Appears to use command line obfuscation

new_signature_details.description: Uses suspicious command line tools or Windows utilities
